replies.bodyText: Removed this. Each implementation will be responsible for defining their equals and hashcode
replies.author: suneet-s

timeline.author: jon-wei

timeline.bodyText: Pattern doesn't implement equals(), you could use Pattern.toString() here and elsewhere
timeline.author: jon-wei

replies.bodyText: I've added an inspection profile failure for this. It was being used in one other class
replies.author: suneet-s

timeline.bodyText: I think the hashCode should use the toString as well
timeline.author: jon-wei
